[Valera Estate](/valeraEstate/) |quests = [Salt in the Wound](/saltInTheWound/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = Equipped gear |body = Leather Armor (Deadfire){{!}}Leather Armor |weapon1 = Pistol (Deadfire){{!}}Pistol |weapon2 = Torch (Deadfire){{!}}Torch |internalname = NPC_VD_Bardatto_Second |guid = 052543ef-5620-43e6-870c-2067b2d02fa5 }} '''Larro's Second''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|Against a backdrop of jeering youths, a young woman raises her arms with an air of practiced drama.
